Reviews.Title: Four way view
Reviews.Author: Danny J. Morton Jr.
Reviews.Content: This thing is mega awsome , I purchased these video camera , I was kind of Skeptical about it but in the end it was a good purchase I have made. I would also recommend getting these to family and fellow ghost hunters

Reviews.Title: Great value!!
Reviews.Author: Debbie J. "Supernatural Superfan!"
Reviews.Content: These cameras were a great buy and they work great for our ghost hunting group!  We are looking at a second DVR system and would definitely buy these again!!

Reviews.Title: Camera's did not last 3 months!
Reviews.Author: Terri Williams
Reviews.Content: Hi, I know how it is to want to secure your home and property. Thats why I bought the camera bundle. It worked good at first, then about 2 months passed and we had one quiet working, so we hooked one up that we hadn't hooked up yet. We purchased 4 all  together, and all four stopped working! Very disapointed.

ProductInfo.Features:
1/3'' Pixim DPS technology. Wide dynamic range solution. NTSC signal system
690TVL High resolution. Built-in 48 IR LEDs for night vision. Built-in Mechanical IR-Cut Filter Switch
Build-in 4-9mm vari-focal lens, quick and easy setup via the On-screen Display (OSD) menu
Weather-resistant casing for indoor and outdoor use application
Package included: 1 of high resolution camera, 1 of 12V DC regulated power supply, 1 of video power BNC RCA extension cable and 1 of security warning decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 1/3" Pixim DPS Sensor Zoom Infrared CCTV Home Surveillance Security Camera 690TVL Day Night Outdoor Weatherproof 4-9mm Varifocal Lens 48 IR LEDs Built-in IR-Cut Filter Switch with Power Supply, Extension Cable and Security Warning Decal WE3
